name: Myth Makers: Orbs of Doom
overview: ROLL INTO ADVENTURE! Join the Myth Makers as they tilt and tumble their way through zany mazes that will work your mind and your reflexes! Features • Pick Up and Play: Intuitive motion-based controls mean players of all skill levels can pick up the Wii Remote¿ and dive right into the fun! • Hours of Fun: Choose from eight Myth Maker characters in single-player mode, or gather your friends for four-player split-screen multiplayer! • Crushin' Game play: Roll your way through over 40 brain-busting levels in five different worlds. Replay your favorites to beat your high score!
